title: You might think St. Louis was all about Gary Habermas
post:
We have discussed teeth issue here: https://shroudstory.com/2014/07/11/teeth-reconsidered/
I stay on the position that teeth are almost certainly visible on the Shroud face negative. However I reject suggestions of any X-ray projections, such as the teeth are projected “from the inside to the outside”. The mouth is simply open, that’s the reason. And I see no reasonable reasons to deny this.The mouth is open so logically, teeth are visible. No magic here -except for the magic that created image.
author: O.K.
